transArray.content: This hotel is my first choice every time I travel to Beijing on business, and the entire lobby is clean, bright and tidy. The attitude of the concierge staff is very good, and they take the initiative to help with luggage, and the concierge will also say hello when entering the door. The attitude of the front desk staff is very good, the service is very enthusiastic, the check-in is fast, the check-in and check-out are very efficient, the business is very professional, very patient, and the service is very good. The room attendant cleans the room and the sanitation is very clean. The shower in the room is very new, the toilet is clean, the towels and bath towels are clean, and the bedding is clean and comfortable. There is also a laundry room in the hotel, which is very convenient. The breakfast is good, and the bar staff are also very friendly. recommended
